title: AMERICAN HORROR STORY Panel – Wizard World Virtual Experiences 2020
author: Fandom Spotlite
description:
American Horror Story actors Naomi Grossman, Marti Matulis, Teddy Sears and Alexander Ward gave a virtual cast panel through Wizard World Virtual Experiences 2020 to talk about the show, their careers and answer AHS fan questions.

Naomi Grossman played Pepper and Samantha Crowe in American Horror Story, but is also known for ctrl alt delete, Wizard School Dropout, Alley Way and Murder RX.

Marti Matulis portrayed Piggy Man in American Horror Story, but has also appeared in Teen Wolf, Evil, Star Trek Picard, Sleepy Hollow, Star Trek Enterprise and Harry Potter and the Tens Years Later.

Teddy Sears was Patrick on American Horror Story, but is also well known for his roles on The Flash, The Politician, Torchwood, 24: Legacy, Chicago Fire and 666 Park Avenue.

Alexander Ward was the Addiction Demon / Mattress Man in American Horror Story, but is also known for Teen Wolf, Sleepy Hollow, Annabelle Comes Home, Escape the Night, Vampire: The Masquerade: L.A. By Night and Westworld.

To learn more about Wizard World Virtual Experiences 2020, plus the autographs, one-on-one video chats and recorded messages available for purchase, visit
